p: A strong upward trend in SST is evident in all four projections ( Fig 2). Scenarios ECE-o and ECE-bc feature a higher average temperature than NESM-o and NESM-bc in particular after 2030. They also show a higher variability in yearly means. The difference between warm and cold years is more pronounced. In addition, the seasonal cycle amplitude as well as the pertaining standard deviation are larger under ECE-o and ECE-bc.
